item.title: Have you thought af any rules for the game yet
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
We know for a fact this will happen too gah, an unfortunate fact.

That said, not everyone on Skype will gamethrow – but for those suspected of gamethrowing, they can be reported. After reported, we’d like to have a system similar to how League of Legends posts it for players to review. However, this is quite complex, so may take a while to implement.

For now, what I’m thinking is, if a person has 3 strikes on their account (3 people reported), an email will be sent to an admin to investigate. Your idea of progressive punishments is great. I don’t think we’ll perma-ban people unless it’s more serious beyond using Skype, but there definitely will be punishments. We have no idea why ToS doesn’t deal with them (laziness, perhaps) – we’ll take care of it.

To be transparent, reporting probably won’t be in alpha, but perhaps beta or release while we’re working on more-core features (friends list [uncapped], matchmaking, etc). Let’s get you guys some features first
